about_the_game:
It starts with a single hexagonal structure, you get to decide its purpose, but by itself, it won't stand for long.
A creature is approaching, looking to destroy your hexagon. Build a turret, Defend it, and multiply it.
The enemy is not alone anymore, a group is coming, but your cannons are loaded and your shields are raised, you are ready.
And so are they.

Gameplay

Role of Hex is a real-time strategy game where you defend your hexagonal base.
Enemies are constantly approaching as you expand outwards, trying to do what you can to survive and thrive.
You are expected to explore the map, exterminate threats, and adapt, to use every droplet of hope that the environment gives to you to match the evergrowing horde that is inevitably coming.

Key Features

  • Infinite randomly generated world that changes every single run
  • Three planets with several biomes and enemies
  • Upgrades, specializations, and equipment so that every run feels unique
  • 50+ different buildings unlockable via equipment
  • 10+ Different enemy variations, some more dangerous than others
  • Active skills upgrades to give you options when the struggle is inevitable
  • Structures scattered around the map with unique skills and effects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GeForce 6000 series or ATI Radeon 9000 series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Role of Hex is a real-time strategy game where you defend your hexagonal base from the dangers of the universe. Gather upgrades and unlock special buildings to survive this hostile land as endless waves of enemies approach. But be quick, time is ticking and the waves are getting bigger.
